branchCategory.name: VFN
branchCategory.description: <p>VFN212N is a 3 port solenoid valve compliant with NAMUR interface.  It can be directly installed on valve actuators that comply with NAMUR.</p>

branchItem.name: VFN212N, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, for NAMUR Interface
branchItem.description: <p>VFN212N is a 3 port solenoid valve compliant with NAMUR interface.  It can be directly installed on valve actuators that comply with NAMUR.</p>
